title: League Not Installing
body: After factory reseting the computer it fails to install correctly. it says messes up with the visual C++ 2005 part

replies.body: There could be a few reasons to why an install would fail, like permissions issues or the source of where the installer was downloaded for example.  I recommend checking out our [reinstall guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to make sure your installation is processing properly.  You can also use our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which provides options to assist with a fresh reinstall.  I hope that helps!
